description: Award-winning food and chocolate tours - treat yourself to our Kensington Market "Taste the World" Food Tour. All tours feature behind the scenes experiences, tidbits of history and lots of delicious food, plus our complimentary neighbourhood guide and food concierge service will help you make the most of Toronto. Besides our regular public tours, we organize private events of all kinds, including sweet & savoury options! Perfect for your birthday, bachelorette party, corporate outing or even marriage proposals. Our goal is to create a sweet & lasting memory for you and your loved ones.

reviews.title: A world of amazing flovours!
text: Totally worth it! Our guide, Odile, was the best! Full of food and historical information on this very special place. 10 out of 10 recommend!

reviews.title: Sunday Funday with Odile
text: What a fabulous time exploring the cute Kensington market area. Odile was an amazing guide. So knowledgeable and entertaining. The food was delish and such a wide variety!  Come hungry!  Cheers!

reviews.title: 10/10 experience
text: Odile is an amazing tour guide!! We had the best time and were stuffed by the end, her way of explaining Toronto’s history is very on point, we loved it!

reviews.title: Odile was amazing
text: Odile was amazing. We really enjoyed the tour. Will definitely recommend to friends and family. Thank you. We specially enjoyed the historical context.

reviews.title: Great food. Learned a lot.
text: Odile was very informative and I really enjoyed it. Many different cultures were represented. I enjoyed the Jamaican patties.

reviews.title: Great fun!!
text: Odila was awesome!!! So many different foods and cultures ! Great history and nice walk!! Great food and sights of restaurants.

reviews.title: I had a great time
text: This was awesome our tour guide odile  was amazing and she speaks French! She also has great knowledge of history of the area

reviews.title: Good food
text: Lots of delicious food from all around the world. Our tour guide and the staff at the restraunts were all very friendly and welcoming.

reviews.title: Good food
text: There was a variety of food and the places they brought us to were cute and cozy (and had some delicious food). Our guide had some good information about the history of the buildings we walked by.

reviews.title: Perfect food tour
text: Foods taste amazing and it is a actually good explanation distance between places are very close and generally really good experience

reviews.title: Adventures in food and culture
text: Odile was a charming and delightful host. I am glad we got to discover the Kensington neighborhood through her grace and expertise!

reviews.title: Tasty Tours Kensington Market Tour was a great experience
text: The tour was really good, all of the foods we tasted were unique and delicious. Odile was our guide and she was very knowledgeable about both the foods and the neighborhood’s history.

reviews.title: Great activity in historic Toronto
text: The orientation to the long and colorful history of Kensington Market and the surrounding neighborhood provided by this tour was great. I appreciated learning my way around the bustling streets, tucked-away alleys, and small businesses and feeling at home (it's not otherwise easily understood). Tasting varied and unique goodies, combined with their story, was delightful.

reviews.title: History, Food, and Shopping
text: Food was amazing! We also passed by many antique and eclectic shops. Odile was an amazing tour guide and discussed the history of the area.

reviews.title: Taste of Kensington
text: Great tour, super good variety of different foods and interesting historic facts about the neighborhood. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Good tour, but I didn't appreciate the bribery
text: While the tour was very good, I was very put off when at the end of the tour the guide asked if she could "bribe" us (her words) with a free chocolate bar if we would give her a 5 star review on the spot.  Those who took out their phones, scanned the QR code, and confirmed their 5 star review were given a chocolate bar.  I passed.

reviews.title: 2 Hours in Toronto
text: Odile gave us a wonderful tour of Kensington Market, sharing more than just the food from 5 different countries, but also the history of Toronto neighborhoods and its many cultures. Excellent food on the tour, and Odile was a great guide. Worth the couple of hours!

reviews.title: Sunday tour of a historic market
text: Fantastic tour!!!!  Great history of the market by Odlie.  Loved the variety of places and types of food.   Would highly recommend!

reviews.title: A great way to spend a couple of hours
text: Odile is an amazing guide who manages to make the food tour both educational and fun. This is a great way to spend a couple of hours in multicultural Toronto and Kensington Market.

reviews.title: Tasty tour
text: Great food.  Odile was our tour guide.  She was very informative and led us through an amazing district!  We tried various foods from different cultures.

reviews.title: Great girls trip activity
text: Odile was fabulous- very informative - lots of delicious and different food options! Thank you so much - highly recommend!

reviews.title: Tasty, informative and historical
text: Plenty of stops, variety, and history! Odile was great! She gives a good mix of history, culture and conversation. A great tour all around

reviews.title: Excellent food tour
text: Odile was super informative. Lovely. Great tour. Well paced. Good variety of tastes and cultures.  Amazing cultural details

reviews.title: Great guide and happy tastebuds
text: This was an amazing experience exposing us to a variety of authentic food that makes Kensington market so original and a true melting pot. We are actually full and the walk and views were well worth it. Odile was amazing to give us a tour of all of our senses.

reviews.title: Absolutely do this tour!
text: Incredible food tour experience! Damien was kind, professional, and so knowledgeable about the culture of the area. You get an amazing variety of food (also definitely adds up to quantity of a good lunch) while supporting local business. Would absolutely recommend to both Toronto natives and travelers!

reviews.title: Kensington Introduction with Taste
text: Great variety for the taste buds. Damien did an excellent guide full of fun facts and history of the area. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Great experience
text: We really enjoyed our tour. We learned some cool things about this area and got to try various cuisines. It was a LOT of food :-) Everything was very well organized. Really enjoyed this outing!

reviews.title: Great experience!
text: We had a great time. Damien was very knowledgeable in the history of Kensington market. Food was great! Please take the advice of a light breakfast because you will be treated to delicious food.

reviews.title: Food, fun, and friends!
text: Had the best time! Our guide was so friendly and knowledgeable. We tasted a variety of foods around the area, and everyone had a different favorite treat. Would highly recommend!

reviews.title: Fun review!
text: Tour was great!! We loved Damien, he was super knowledgeable and kept us entertained through the tour. We would encourage this to anybody visiting the are!

reviews.title: School field trip
text: The views were great, took many amazing photos, the food was great, went on a school field trip. Amazing history was shared with us.

reviews.title: Kensington Sunday Walking Tour
text: We loved hearing about the history of the area and Udine took us to many places we didn’t know existed. Great to sample the many foods and drinks as we walked through Kensington’s market

reviews.title: Fun afternoon to learn new things and taste new foods!
text: Great afternoon to learn some history and try some bites from around the world!  Odile was very knowledgeable and taught us  more than expected!

reviews.title: Great way to spend your day in Toronto
text: Odile was an awesome tour guide and we got to taste a variety of delicious foods from all over the world. The food was great!

reviews.title: History and tasty, together at last!
text: Wonderful tour that gave me a whole new sense of Kensington Market! Odile did a great job of herding us despite all the tasty distractions!

reviews.title: Amazing
text: We had an amazing tour. Odile was very knowledgeable and an excellent tour guide. The Kensington market is an amazing place to have a food tour

reviews.title: Come hungry :)
text: Had a lovely time with Odele today, showed us places in Kensington market we wouldn’t have thought to visit. It was a fun and tasty day and highly recommend to locals and tourists.

reviews.title: Unique, yummy, eclectic Kensington Market Tour!!
text: Damien was a great guide!! We had a wonderful time!!! Great locations, some history or the area and pacing was awesome, never felt rushed or bored.

reviews.title: Awesome!
text: It was a pleasure, doing the tour with Odile, I would highly recommend it. She was very sweet and knowledgeable and the food was delicious.

reviews.title: Informative and delicious!
text: Odile was so knowledgeable and kind. Nice variety of food and plenty of it! Highly recommended this fun food tour with international flair!
